import React from 'react' import "./app1.css" const App = () => { const [questionNumber,setQuestionNumber]= React.useState(1) const moneyPyramid=[ { id: 1, amount: "$ 100" }, { id: 2, amount: "$ 200" }, { id: 3, amount: "$ 300" }, { id: 4, amount: "$ 500" }, { id: 5, amount: "$ 1000" }, { id: 6, amount: "$ 2000" }, { id: 7, amount: "$ 4000" }, { id: 8, amount: "$ 8000" }, { id: 9, amount: "$ 16000" }, { id: 10, amount: "$ 32000" }, { id: 11, amount: "$ 64000" }, { id: 12, amount: "$ 125000" }, { id: 13, amount: "$ 250000" }, { id: 14, amount: "$ 500000" }, { id: 15, amount: "$ 1000000" }, ].reverse(); return (
30
question and answers
    {moneyPyramid.map((m)=> (
  • {m.id} {m.amount}
    • ))}
) } export default App
